pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 6, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, September 6, 2017:

Kelowna, British Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Skeena-Pennask-Schuswap Room
Delta Hotels Grand Okanagan Resort    

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for Prime Minister’s remarks at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall at the University of British Columbia’s Okanagan Campus.

UBC Okanagan Gymnasium
3211 Athletics Court

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m. via the lower level entrance.
  • Media should check in at Room 090 Studio 1

Note: all times local
